flawed_nl_solution:
Jimmy earned 20 * 3 = <<20*3=60>>60 points for the exams he wrote.
For bad behavior, he lost 5 points, so he has 60 - 5 = <<60-5=53>>53 points left.
To pass to the next class, Jimmy needs at least 50 points, so he can lose 53 - 50 = <<53-50=3>>3 more points.
